channel.title: Members Only Items
channel.description: In my server I recently addded members, but I want to make some weapons members only. Any TUTs or ways of doing this. TY

item.title: Members Only Items
item.dc:creator: @HelpMePloxed HelpMePloxed
item.description:
@HelpMePloxed wrote:

Well What I Want Is That people with playerIsMember = 1 can specific weapons.

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:165134”]If you want the item name to be shown as “members’ item” you’ll need to use a client.
If you want it to send a message saying “You cannot weild this item”, you can edit the packet for equipping items which is case 41: in the switch statement for packetType.

Alternatively, you can just edit the “wear” boolean.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Members Only Items
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

If you want the item name to be shown as “members’ item” you’ll need to use a client.
If you want it to send a message saying “You cannot weild this item”, you can edit the packet for equipping items which is case 41: in the switch statement for packetType.

Alternatively, you can just edit the “wear” boolean.

Read full topic
